sections.heading: to borrow money; how construed
sections.text: Section 79-1070 shall be independent of and in addition to any other provisions of the laws of the State of Nebraska, and such section shall not be considered amendatory of or limited by any other laws of the State of Nebraska. Such section does not prohibit or limit t
